answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
I have done some research on sky lanterns and have found that most of the formal bans occurred or were proposed in Canada, the United Kingdom, and Australia. 
The one state that is publically pushing to ban sky lanterns is Hawaii. The fire departments on three of the islands have urged their communities not to use the lanterns and retailers to pull them from the shelves.
http://www.staradvertiser.com/news/20101231_Fire_officials_fret_over_new_sky_lanterns.html 
In Australia the federal government put a temporary ban on the use and sales of the lanterns.
http://www.theaustralian.com.au/news/breaking-news/sky-lanterns-banned/story-fn3dxity-1225767293378
In the UK they have become extremely popular at weddings and other events which have brought sky lanterns national attention. One reporter does a good job of summarizing some of the risks and mishaps which have occurred due to the use of sky lanterns in the UK.
http://www.examiner.com/wedding-and-marriage-in-national/wedding-flame-out-uk-agencies-calling-for-ban-on-wedding-sky-lanterns 
While they have yet to ban them fully in the UK the Civil Aviation Authority is requiring that lantern releases become registered events. This way they can be tracked and not interfere with flights.
http://www.travelio.net/aviation-regulator-issues-guidance-on-sky-lantern-releases.html 
If you find that a ban is not possible, I have also included a document with instructions on how to properly light and release the lanterns as to make the process as safe as possible.
http://showme.co.za/plett/events-entertainment/sky-lantern-release-safety-guidelines/
I hope these off you some help. If anyone is having problems with sky lanterns in their area feel free to share your solutions here!
I hope these links are helpful!
Ali Iannolo
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: Karen Windon
text: Has your jurisdiction enacted a ban against sky lanterns?  A Sky Lantern is essentially a miniature, unmanned hot air balloon that relies on an open flame as a heat source to heat the air inside the lantern with the intention of causing it to lift into the atmosphere. They are used in celebrations and after the movie "Tangled" last year they have become more popular in weddings. We have concerns with the fire potential as well as the impacts on aviation.
title: Sky Lantern ban
